provenance:
Kunsthalle, Hamburg, Germany; [1] (Galerie Fischer sale, Grand Hôtel National, Lucerne, Switzerland, 30 June 1939, lot 67); [2] Josef von Sternberg, Hollywood, California; (Sternberg sale, Parke-Bernet Galleries, New York, New York, 22 November 1949, lot 90); Putnam Dana McMillan [died 1961], Minneapolis, Minnesota; bequest to MIA in 1961.

[1] Confiscated by Nazis in 1937, according to Stephanie Barron, 'Degenerate Art: The Fate of the Avant-Garde in Nazi Germany', LACMA, 1991, 160.

[2] Sold to Sternberg according to Barron.
signed: Dated on ptg: [25]; on verso: [OK London Juli 25]
title: Tower Bridge, London
